## listGroupItemVariant

Basic css helper for different colored ListGroupItem components.

### Parameters

-   `enableHoverMediaQuery` **bool**  (optional, default `defaultProps['$enable-hover-media-query']`)
-   `state` **[string][1]** 
-   `background` **[string][1]** 
-   `listColor` **[string][1]** 

Returns **[string][1]**
